cards.name: Ornithopter
cards.flavortext: "It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."\nâ€”Urza, in his apprenticeship

cards.name: Thopter Foundry
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life.

cards.name: Canoptek Scarab Swarm
cards.text: Flying\nFeeder Mandibles â€” When this creature enters, exile target player's graveyard. For each artifact or land card exiled this way, create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying.

commander.name: Sam, Loyal Attendant
commander.text: Partner with Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit (When this creature enters, target player may put Frodo into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")\nActivated abilities of Foods you control cost {1} less to activate.

commander.name: Evie Frye
commander.text: Partner with Jacob Frye (When this creature enters, target player may put Jacob into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)\n{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a creature card this way, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Kodama of the East Tree
cards.text: Reach\nWhenever another permanent you control enters, if it wasn't put onto the battlefield with this ability, you may put a permanent card with equal or lesser mana value from your hand onto the battlefield.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.name: Treetop Bracers
cards.flavortext: Gravity is truly what you make of it.
cards.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

cards.name: Ironroot Treefolk
cards.flavortext: The mating habits of Treefolk, particularly the stalwart Ironroot Treefolk, are truly absurd. Molasses comes to mind. It's amazing the species can survive at all given such protracted periods of mate selection, conjugation, and gestation.

cards.name: Opt
cards.flavortext: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?
cards.text: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)\nDraw a card.
